mapper.update: update TB_SAAS_APPLICATION a set a.RECOVER_FLAG = '0' where a.RECOVER_FLAG = '99' and a.CREATOR in ( select r.RE_IDCARD from TB_SAAS_RECOVER_INFO r where APP_INFO_ID = #{id} group by r.RE_IDCARD )
update TB_SAAS_APPLICATION a set a.RECOVER_FLAG = '-1' where a.STATUS = '3' and a.CREATOR in ( select r.RE_IDCARD from TB_SAAS_RECOVER_INFO r where APP_INFO_ID = #{id} group by r.RE_IDCARD )
mapper.select: select a.*, (select count(*) from TB_SAAS_APPLICATION_EXT ext where ext.MASTER_ID = a.ID) NUM from TB_SAAS_APPLICATION a where a.MERGE_ID = #{mergeId} and a.IS_IMPORT = 0

SELECT count(DISTINCT ai.ID) FROM TB_SAAS_APPLICATION_MERGE ai join TB_WFM_INSTANCE ins on ins.BUSINESSID = ai.ID join TB_WFM_ACTIVITY act on act.INSTANCEID = ins.ID WHERE ai.STATUS in (1,2,7,101,102) and ai.IS_IMPORT = 0 and act.HANDLEPERSONIDS = #{user.idcard} and act.ACTIVITYTYPE is null and act.ACTIVITYSTATUS = '待办'

select a.ID,a.CREATOR,a.CREATOR_NAME,a.ORG_ID,a.ORG_NAME,b.SERVICE_ID,b.SERVICE_NAME from TB_SAAS_APPLICATION a JOIN TB_SAAS_APPLICATION_EXT b ON a.ID = b.MASTER_ID
where a.creator=#{userId} and a.RECOVER_FLAG != '-1' and a.STATUS ='3'
select d.NAME from TB_SAAS c join SYS_DICT d on c.SUB_TYPE = d.ID where c.ID =#{id}
select * from TB_SAAS_APPLICATION where CREATOR = #{userId}
